text: The southern lapwing (Vanellus chilensis) is a large long-legged bird. Lapwings are shorebirds. It is a common in Central and South America, except in the jungles of the Amazon and the Andes. It is the national bird of Uruguay. Category:Charadriiformes Category:Birds of Central America Category:Birds of South America Category:National symbols of Uruguay
title: Southern lapwing
